H0.text: Which country invaded the Falkland Islands in April 1982. Chile

H1.text: Which country invaded the Falkland Islands in April 1982. Uruguay

H2.text: Which country invaded the Falkland Islands in April 1982. Brazil

H3.text: Which country invaded the Falkland Islands in April 1982. Argie

A4.text: Argentina invaded the Falkland Islands in April 1982.

A5.text: The British responded with an expeditionary force that forced the Argentines to surrender.

A6.text: Britain was supported by Chile during the Falklands War.
